name: Greek Dressing
description: Classic Mediterranean flavours of mint, oregano and garlic, ready in minutes! This versatile dressing brings out the best in just about every dishâ€”it can be drizzled over just about anything your heart desires. Salads, fresh and roasted veggies, grilled pitas, you name it! The best part? Unlike those store-bought versions that can pack in over 100 mg of sodium, this homemade version has almost none.
preparation: In a Cruet, combine dressing mix, oil, and red wine vinegar; shake well. Store in the fridge for up to 1 week.
tips: To make a creamy Greek Feta version, add 2 tbsp crumbled feta cheese to prepared dressing.
